title: a Simplest Watch Face (FREE)
summary: The Simplest Watch Face for Android Wear.A battery lasts long by power-saving.
description: The Simplest Watch Face for Android Wear.Colors change with the time.A date, a day of the week and time are being always shown even if the notification arrives.A battery isn't consumed wastefully because second hand and wasteful decoration were omitted entirely.A screen renewal is once a minute, so your battery lasts long.And it's FREE!
descriptionHTML:
The Simplest Watch Face for Android Wear.
Colors change with the time.
A date, a day of the week and time are being always shown even if the notification arrives.
A battery isn't consumed wastefully because second hand and wasteful decoration were omitted entirely.
A screen renewal is once a minute, so your battery lasts long.
And it's FREE!
